MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK9 postcode area Stirling, affecting properties in Graham Avenue and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we identified an underground cable fault on Graham Avenue and we now expect your supply to be restored by 4pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.05pm on Thursday 5th November 2020.
